summary: The FabricPipeline class orchestrates a Stable Diffusion based text-to-image generation workflow that incorporates additional conditioning from user-provided feedback images. It handles prompt encoding, feedback image preprocessing, latent diffusion via a UNet and scheduler, optional safety checking, and decodes the final images.
business_intent: Provide developers and creative professionals with a controllable AI image generation tool that refines outputs using reference images, facilitating applications like marketing asset creation, product visualization, and artistic content production.
